shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure "talosctl read /system/state/config.yaml | yq '.cluster.allowSchedulingOnControlPlanes | select(. != null)' " output Equals 'false' (boolean)
Ensure "talosctl get admissioncontrolconfigs.kubernetes.talos.dev admission-control -o yaml | yq '.spec.config[0].configuration.defaults.enforce'" output Equals 'restricted' (string)
Ensure "talosctl get mc -oyaml | yq '.spec.machine.features.rbac'" output Equals 'true' (boolean)

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure "talosctl read /system/state/config.yaml | yq '.cluster.allowSchedulingOnControlPlanes | select(. != null)' " output Equals 'false' (boolean)
Ensure "talosctl get admissioncontrolconfigs.kubernetes.talos.dev admission-control -o yaml | yq '.spec.config[0].configuration.defaults.enforce'" output Equals 'restricted' (string)
Ensure "talosctl get mc -oyaml | yq '.spec.machine.features.rbac'" output Equals 'true' (boolean)

shellcommand_object.command: talosctl read /system/state/config.yaml | yq 'select(.kind == "KmsgLogConfig")'; talosctl read /proc/cmdline | grep 'talos.logging.kernel'

shellcommand_state.comment: Ensure "talosctl read /system/state/config.yaml | yq '.cluster.allowSchedulingOnControlPlanes | select(. != null)' " output Equals 'false' (boolean)
Ensure "talosctl get admissioncontrolconfigs.kubernetes.talos.dev admission-control -o yaml | yq '.spec.config[0].configuration.defaults.enforce'" output Equals 'restricted' (string)
Ensure "talosctl get mc -oyaml | yq '.spec.machine.features.rbac'" output Equals 'true' (boolean)
